meanings.definition: Lacking a column or columns in architecture.
meanings.sent1: The astylar building had a modern and open feel.
meanings.sent2: The architect chose an astylar design to create a spacious interior.
meanings.sent3: The astylar house confused the neighbors, who were used to traditional styles.
meanings.sent4: Her astylar approach to decorating was like a breath of fresh air in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The astylar structure stood out among the rows of columned buildings.

meanings.definition: Without a column or columns in design or structure.
meanings.sent1: The astylar room felt airy and uncluttered.
meanings.sent2: The designer opted for an astylar look to enhance the minimalist aesthetic.
meanings.sent3: The astylar furniture arrangement puzzled the guests at the party.
meanings.sent4: His astylar fashion sense was a bold departure from the norm.
meanings.sent5: The astylar layout of the garden created a sense of freedom and space.
